scripts.start: concurrently "npm start --prefix frontend" "cd backend && python manage.py runserver"
scripts.start-backend: cd backend && pg_isready || (echo 'PostgreSQL is not running! Start it first.' && exit 1) && python manage.py runserver
scripts.setup-backend: cd backend && python3 -m venv venv && source venv/bin/activate && pip install -r requirements.txt
